name: Ms. Toaster & Mr. Mixer vs. the Unyielding Utensils
name_original: Ms. Toaster & Mr. Mixer vs. the Unyielding Utensils
description:
This game was made by Quinten Heijn and Victor Gladys for the 2021 Game Makers Toolkit GameJam. The theme was "Joined Together".

In this game you fight evil kitchen utensils with a mixer and a toaster whose controls and health pools are joined together.


Controls:

• WASD to move the Toaster and rotate (then shoot) with the Mixer.

• Arrows to move the Mixer and rotate (then shoot) with the Toaster.

• About shooting: Both the Mixer and the Toaster have two bullets to shoot at a time. They will reload as soon as the projectiles are not on the screen anymore. Before shooting in a direction, the toaster and mixer will have to rotate to that direction.

Special thanks to Ramon Selles (with a highscore of 55!), for his arrangement and orchestration of the Barcarolle.
